title: This Week's Top Stories - Russia Bombs Ukrainian Civilians, Biden Bans Russian Oil & More
itunes:title: This Week's Top Stories - Russia Bombs Ukrainian Civilians, Biden Bans Russian Oil & More
description:
Russia bombs civilians trying to escape Ukraine, skyrocketing gas prices create headaches in the U.S. as President Biden announces a ban on Russian oil, and NATO countries tread carefully.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
